title: Pencil & Eraser - Novel Updates
author: Kobata Aiko   小畠愛子
description:
During the kanji test, I heard a mysterious voice. Apparently the voice comes from the eraser. The eraser shouldn't be scuffed! I'm angry with Moe. Moe can not use the eraser, to mistake also test of Kanji characters, but wit's end without indelible also shaped you make a mistake in kanji drill, in turn, come hear the voices from the pencil - 
here ...... >
